title: kev
description: Known Exploited Vulnerabilities from CISA catalog.

_key.description: The kev key as a CVE ID of the vulnerability in the format KEV-CVE-YYYY-NNNN, note that the number portion can have more than 4 digits

original_id.description: The CVE ID of the vulnerability in the format CVE-YYYY-NNNN, note that the number portion can have more than 4 digits

description.description: A short description of the vulnerability

requiredAction.description: The required action to address the vulnerability

vendorProject.description: The vendor or project name for the vulnerability
